title: Player Requests Account Deletion (GDPR)
description: A player from the EU submits a formal request to have all their personal data and game account deleted under GDPR.

tasks.description: Verify the player's identity to confirm they are the legitimate account owner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the enhanced identity verification process.

tasks.description: Initiate the automated GDPR data deletion workflow for the player's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully triggers the deletion process.

tasks.description: Monitor the workflow to ensure data is purged from all systems (game servers, CRM, analytics).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the workflow completes successfully and all data is anonymized or deleted.

tasks.description: Send a final confirmation email to the player once the process is complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the official confirmation of data deletion.
